attributes.action: Stop debt collection companys destroying peoples credit score
attributes.background: I think it is wrong for companys like lowell financial to report on peoples credit scores and also perform hard searches comstantly to trace them . This destroys people finamcialy and needs to be stopped

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
